thread.title: Withing a short stroll to the Eiffel Tower.
thread.title_full: Withing a short stroll to the Eiffel Tower. - Review of Pullman Paris Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: alinalovetotravel
title: Withing a short stroll to the Eiffel Tower.
text: Very nice hotel, with large americam style room, they provide very nice amenities,like bathrobes and slippers, very clean and modern,ask for a balcony room and you will have a view of the Eiffel Tower right in your face. There's a restaurant in the hotel when you walk outside and also a bar in the lobby which serves coffee in the mornings, the neighbor is very upscale with nice apartments buildings, also small restaurants and grocery stores in which you can buy french bread and cheese and have a picnic by the tower, also the river cruises and the Hop on Hop off Bus stops are withing walking distance, I would say this is the best one of the most central location you can stay in Paris.
